front.title: RTP Payload Format for Essential Video Coding (EVC)

abstract.t: This memo describes an RTP payload format for the video coding standard ISO/IEC International Standard 23094-1 [EVC], also known as Essential Video Coding [EVC] and developed by ISO/IEC JTC1/SC29/WG11 (MPEG). The RTP payload format allows for packetization of one or more Network Abstraction Layer (NAL) units in each RTP packet payload as well as fragmentation of a NAL unit into multiple RTP packets. The payload format has wide applicability in videoconferencing, Internet video streaming, and high-bitrate entertainment-quality video, among other applications.
